original_text:
The clamor will resound to the ends of the earth,
    for the Lord has an indictment against the nations;
he is entering into judgment with all flesh,
    and the wicked he will put to the sword,
declares the Lord.’
korean_text: 요란한 소리가 땅 끝까지 이름은 여호와께서 뭇 민족과 다투시며 모든 육체를 심판하시며 악인을 칼에 내어 주셨음이라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: The clamor will resound to the ends of the earth,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 소란이 땅 끝까지 울려 퍼지리니,

sentences.original_text: for the Lord has an indictment against the nations;
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주께서 민족들을 향하여 고소가 있으심이라;

sentences.original_text: he is entering into judgment with all flesh,
and the wicked he will put to the sword,
